org.apache.commons.math.ode
Class FirstOrderIntegratorFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.math.ode.FirstOrderIntegratorFactory
      org.apache.commons.math.ode.FirstOrderIntegratorFactoryImpl

public class FirstOrderIntegratorFactoryImpl
extends FirstOrderIntegratorFactory

Provide a default implementation for several functions useful to generic integrators.

Version:

Method Detail

newDefaultFixedStepsizeIntegrator

public FirstOrderIntegrator newDefaultFixedStepsizeIntegrator(double step)
Create a new fixed stepsize FirstOrderIntegrator. This factory buid a classical Runge-Kutta integrator by default.

Specified by:
newDefaultFixedStepsizeIntegrator in class FirstOrderIntegratorFactory
Parameters:
step - the fixed stepsize.
Returns:
the new fixed step integrator

newDefaultAdaptiveStepsizeIntegrator

public AdaptiveStepsizeIntegrator newDefaultAdaptiveStepsizeIntegrator(double minStep,
                                                                       double maxStep,
                                                                       double scalAbsoluteTolerance,
                                                                       double scalRelativeTolerance)
Create a new AdaptiveStepsizeIntegrator. This factory buid a Dormand-Prince 8(5,3) integrator by default.

Specified by:
newDefaultAdaptiveStepsizeIntegrator in class FirstOrderIntegratorFactory
Parameters:
minStep - minimal step (must be positive even for backward integration), the last step can be smaller than this
maxStep - maximal step (must be positive even for backward integration)
scalAbsoluteTolerance - allowed absolute error
scalRelativeTolerance - allowed relative error
Returns:
the new adaptive stepsize integrator
